name: NFL Quarterback Club
overview: It's a 32X blitz... NFL Quarterback Club upgrades the action with the most authentic gridiron game play and '94 QB and team attributes! All-new advanced passing gives you 80 yards of viewable field to hit the open man, multi-view perspectives heat up the running game with in-your-face action and the exclusive Smooth-Cam delivers the most advanced instant replay from virtually any angle. NFL Quarterback Club on 32X...
